TypeSignature.Value: public class UpdateProgress : System.Web.UI.Control, System.Web.UI.IAttributeAccessor, System.Web.UI.IScriptControl
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UpdateProgress extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.UI.IAttributeAccessor, class System.Web.UI.IScriptControl
Public Class UpdateProgress Inherits Control Implements IAttributeAccessor, IScriptControl
public ref class UpdateProgress : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::UI::IAttributeAccessor, System::Web::UI::IScriptControl
type UpdateProgress = class inherit Control interface IAttributeAccessor interface IScriptControl

summary.span: 當更新一個或多個 控制項的內容時，在瀏覽器上提供視覺化回應。

span.span: Provides visual feedback in the browser when the contents of one or more controls are updated.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [UpdateProgress 關聯 UpdatePanel 控制項Associating an UpdateProgress with an UpdatePanel Control](#associating_an_updateprogress_with_an_updatepanel_control) - [指定 UpdateProgress 控制項的內容Specifying the Content of the UpdateProgress Control](#specifying_the_content_of_the_updateprogress_control) - [將頁面上的 UpdateProgress 控制項Putting UpdateProgress Controls on the Page](#putting_updateprogress_controls_on_the_page) - [UpdateProgress 控制項顯示時，自訂Customizing When UpdateProgress Controls Are Displayed](#customizing_when_updateprogress_controls_are_displayed) - [套用 CSS 樣式Applying CSS Styles](#applying_styles) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 控制項可讓您提供意見反應在局部網頁呈現的進度。The control enables you to provide feedback about the progress of partial-page rendering. 回傳或初始頁面呈現不會顯示控制項內容。For postbacks or initial page rendering, control content is not displayed. 頁面可以包含多個控制項。The page can contain multiple controls. 每個可以與其他相關聯控制項。Each one can be associated with a different control. 或者，您可以使用其中一個控制項，並將它與所有關聯頁面上的控制項。Alternatively, you can use one control and associate it with all the controls on the page. 控制呈現`div`項目，是否要顯示或隱藏取決於，回傳來源和是否屬性控制項設定。The control renders a `div` element that is displayed or hidden depending on where a postback originates and whether the property of the control is set. ## UpdateProgress 關聯 UpdatePanel 控制項Associating an UpdateProgress with an UpdatePanel Control 您將建立關聯控制項藉由設定控制屬性控制項。You associate controls with an control by setting the property of the control. 回傳事件是來自內部控制項，所有相關聯控制項都會顯示。When a postback event originates from inside an control, any associated controls are displayed. 如果您未設定屬性，控制項會顯示在任何來自任何非同步回傳的進度控制項。If you do not set the property, the control displays progress for any asynchronous postback that originates from inside any control. 它也會顯示任何觸發程序面板的控制項。It is also displayed for any controls that are triggers for panels. 屬性具有下列結果控制行為：The property has the following effect on control behavior: - 當未設定屬性，控制項顯示的下列回傳：When the property is not set, the control is displayed for the following postbacks: - 來自任何內部的回傳控制項。Postbacks that originate from inside any control. - 來自任何非同步觸發程序的控制項的回傳控制項。Postbacks that originate from controls that are asynchronous triggers for any control. - 當屬性設定為控制項 ID，源自內相關聯的回傳控制項顯示控制項。When the property is set to an control ID, the control is displayed for postbacks that originate from inside the associated control. 如果屬性設定為不存在，控制將永遠不會顯示控制項。If the property is set to a control that does not exist, the control will never be shown. 如果的屬性控制項設定為`false`以及回傳所有源自內控制項，所有相關聯仍會顯示控制項。If the property of the controls is set to `false` and a postback originates from inside an control, any associated controls will still be displayed. ## 指定 UpdateProgress 控制項的內容Specifying the Content of the UpdateProgress Control 使用屬性來指定所顯示的訊息控制項。Use the property to specify the message that is displayed by an control. 如果屬性是空的不會顯示當顯示控制項。If the property is empty, nothing is shown when the control is displayed. 範本可包含 HTML 和標記。The template can contain HTML and markup. 例如，您可以顯示動畫的影像，通知使用者正在處理回傳。For example, you can display an animated image that notifies the user that the postback is processing. 您也可以顯示一個按鈕，使用者可以按一下要停止網頁局部更新。You can also display a button that the user can click to stop the partial-page update. 此外，您可能會想防止所有其他的回傳，而另一個是在進行中。Additionally, you might want to prevent all other postbacks while one is in progress. 下列範例會顯示您可以使用它來完成這些工作的用戶端指令碼。The following example shows client script that you can use to accomplish these tasks. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress4/CS/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress4/VB/default.aspx#1)] 您可以使用範例程式碼，藉由設定`onClick`屬性的`HtmlButton`"AbortPostBack() 」 控制項。You can use the example code by setting the `onClick` attribute of an `HtmlButton` control to "AbortPostBack()". 如需詳細資訊，請參閱方法和類別的屬性。For more information, see the method and the property of the class. ## 將頁面上的 UpdateProgress 控制項Putting UpdateProgress Controls on the Page 控制項可以是內部或外部其他控制項。 controls can be inside or outside other controls. 顯示控制項的範本不需依賴 where控制項所在。The display of the control's template does not depend on where the control is located. 在巢狀控制項，是在父面板內的子面板。In a nested control, a child panel is inside a parent panel. 在此情況下，來自子面板內部的回傳會導致所有子面板和父面板會顯示相關聯的控制項。In that case, a postback that originates from inside the child panel causes all controls associated with the child panel and the parent panel to be displayed. 如果是來自父面板，只有直接子控制項的回傳父面板相關聯的控制項都會顯示。If a postback originates from an immediate child control of the parent panel, only the controls that are associated with the parent panel are displayed. ## UpdateProgress 控制項顯示時，自訂Customizing When UpdateProgress Controls Are Displayed 根據預設，控制等候.5 秒 （500 毫秒） 顯示其內容之前。By default, the control waits .5 seconds (500 milliseconds) before it displays its contents. 這有助於防止控制項不停閃爍，如果非同步回傳是非常快速。This helps prevent the control from flashing if an asynchronous postback is very quick. 您可以指定延遲，藉由設定屬性。You can specify the delay by setting the property. 如果您需要時的更細微地控制控制項顯示，您可以提供用戶端指令碼和類別的事件。If you need finer control over when an control is displayed, you can provide client script for the and events of the class. 在 `beginRequest`事件處理常式，您可以顯示 DOM 項目，表示控制項。In the `beginRequest` event handler, you can display the DOM element that represents the control. 在 `endRequest`事件處理常式，您可以隱藏它。In the `endRequest` event handler, you can hide it. 您必須提供要顯示的用戶端指令碼為目標時，控制控制項已更新在下列情況：You must provide client script to display an control when a target control is updated in the following circumstances: - 當從控制項的回傳會註冊為非同步回傳的觸發程序面板，並沒有頁面上的控制項。When a postback from a control is registered as an asynchronous postback trigger for the panel, and there is an control on the page. 不過，屬性未設定的面板識別碼。However, the property is not set to the panel's ID. - 當從控制項的回傳會註冊為非同步回傳的控制項使用方法的控制項。When postbacks from controls are registered as asynchronous postback controls by using the method of the control. ## 套用 CSS 樣式Applying CSS Styles 控制項可接受的 expando 屬性。The control accepts expando attributes. 這讓您能夠設定控制項的呈現 HTMLelements CSS 類別。This makes it possible to set a CSS class on the HTMLelements that the controls render. 例如，您可能會建立在下列範例中所顯示的標記：For example, you might create the markup shown in the following example: ``` ``` 在上述範例中的標記會轉譯 HTML 類似下面的網頁執行時：The markup in the previous example renders HTML similar to the following when the page runs: ```
``` ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ```                                ``` ## Examples 下列範例顯示不同的方式使用非同步回傳期間顯示進度的控制項。The following examples show different ways to use the control to show progress during asynchronous postbacks. 下列範例所示兩個顯示的進度狀態的控制項控制項。The following example shows one control that displays progress status for two controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress1/CS/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress1/VB/default.aspx#1)] 下列範例示範兩個控制項。This following example shows two controls. 每個控制項顯示為相關聯的進度狀態控制項。Each control displays progress status for an associated control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress2/CS/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress2/VB/default.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立，以動態方式控制，您建立自訂範本繼承自控制項。When you create an control dynamically, you create a custom template that inherits from the control. 指定在標記方法，然後再把屬性的動態建立控制項的自訂範本的新執行個體。You specify markup in the method, and then set the property of the dynamically created control to a new instance of the custom template. 當您建立，以動態方式控制您必須進行期間或之前頁面的事件。When you create controls dynamically, you must do so during or before the event of the page. 如果您建立稍後在頁面生命週期，進度的控制項不會顯示。If you create the control later in the page life cycle, progress is not displayed.

Attribute.AttributeName: set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項顯示其狀態之 控制項的 ID。

span.span: Gets or sets the ID of the control that the control displays status for.

value.span: 關聯 控制項的 ID。

span.span: The ID of the associated control.
The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值為空字串，表示控制項不是特定與相關聯控制項。The default value is an empty string, which means that the control is not associated with a specific control. 因此，非同步回傳，源自內任何控制項或從觸發程序面板原因的控制項的回傳控制項來顯示其內容。Therefore, asynchronous postbacks that originate from inside any control or postbacks from controls that are triggers for the panel cause the control to display its content. 您可以設定控制項相同的命名容器中、 在父命名容器中，或在頁面中的屬性。You can set the property to controls in the same naming container, in a parent naming container, or in the page.

summary.span: 取得或設定在顯示 控制項之前的毫秒值。

span.span: An integer that represents the number of milliseconds before the control's progress template is displayed.

value.span: 預設值為 500 毫秒 (0.5 秒)。

span.span: The default is 500 milliseconds (.5 seconds).
The property is less than zero.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會判斷進度範本是否為動態呈現的。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the progress template is rendered dynamically.

value.span: 若進度範本動態轉譯為，則 ，否則 。

span.span: if the progress template is rendered dynamically; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定只在需要時，是否要進度範本內容的空間配置的頁面上。The property determines whether space for the progress template's contents is allocated on the page only when it is needed. 當屬性是`true`，第一次呈現的頁面時，不會配置空間進度範本的內容。When the property is `true`, space for the progress template's contents is not allocated when the page is first rendered. 相反地，頁面來顯示內容，必要時變更以動態方式。Instead, the page changes dynamically to display the contents when it is required. 在 `style`屬性`div`元素，其中包含在呈現的標記，進度範本`display`屬性設為`none`。In the `style` property of the `div` element that contains the progress template in the rendered markup, the `display` attribute is set to `none`. 時屬性是`false`，當第一次呈現網頁時，已配置空間的進度範本的內容和控制項內容實體是頁面配置的一部分。When the property is `false`, space for the progress template's contents is allocated when the page is first rendered, and the control content is physically part of the page layout. 在`style`屬性`div`元素，其中包含在呈現的標記，進度範本`display`屬性設定為`block`，而`visibility`屬性一開始會設為`hidden`。In the `style` property of the `div` element that contains the progress template in the rendered markup, the `display` attribute is set to `block`, and the `visibility` attribute is initially set to `hidden`.

summary.span: 取得或設定用於定義 控制項內容的範本。

span.span: Gets or sets the template that defines the content of the control.

value.span: 定義 控制項之內容的 執行個體。

span.span: An instance that defines the content of the control.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必須定義範本。The template must be defined. 否則，期間擲回例外狀況控制項的`Init`事件。Otherwise, an exception is thrown during the control's `Init` event. 您可以指定屬性，以宣告方式是藉由新增標記，以`ProgressTemplate`項目。You can specify the property declaratively by adding markup to the `ProgressTemplate` element. 如果在沒有標記`ProgressTemplate`項目，不會顯示控制項。If there is no markup in the `ProgressTemplate` element, nothing is displayed for the control. 如果您要建立，以動態方式控制您可以建立自訂的範本繼承自控制項。If you are creating controls dynamically, you can create a custom template that inherits from the control. 指定在標記方法，然後再把屬性的動態建立控制項的自訂範本的新執行個體。You specify markup in the method, and then set the property of the dynamically created control to a new instance of the custom template. 如果您建立控制項，以動態方式執行這項操作期間或之前頁面的事件。If you create controls dynamically, do so during or before the event of the page. 如果您建立稍後在頁面生命週期，進度的控制項不會顯示。If you create the control later in the page life cycle, progress is not displayed.

related.span: ASP.NET Web 伺服器控制項範本

span.span: ASP.NET Web Server Controls Templates

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void Render (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void Render(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub Render (writer As HtmlTextWriter)
protected public: override void Render(System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriter ^ writer);

param.name: writer
param.span: 表示要呈現 HTML 內容之輸出資料流的物件。

span.span: An object that represents the output stream for rendering HTML content.

summary.span: 將 控制項的呈現內容寫入至瀏覽器，方法是使用提供的 物件。

span.span: Writes the rendered content of the control to the browser by using the supplied object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法以擴充功能時，正由控制項開發人員控制項。The method is used by control developers to extend the functionality of the control. 方法會將寫入的呈現的內容使用所提供的瀏覽器控制項物件。The method writes the rendered content of the control to the browser by using the supplied object. 當您覆寫方法在衍生類別中，呼叫的基底類別方法，讓子控制項的控制項所呈現。When you override the method in a derived class, call the base class's method so that the child controls of the control are rendered.

related.span: ASP.NET 網頁生命週期概觀

span.span: ASP.NET Page Life Cycle Overview

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
